mapper.sql: mechanicid, mechanicname, mechanicsex, mechanicphone, contactphone, urgentphone, groupleader, teamid, starclassid, remarks
mapper.insert: insert into mechanic (mechanicid, mechanicname, mechanicsex, mechanicphone, contactphone, urgentphone, groupleader, teamid, remarks ) values (#{mechanicid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mechanicname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mechanicsex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mechanicphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urgentphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupleader,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teamid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into mechanic
mechanicid,
mechanicname,
mechanicsex,
mechanicphone,
contactphone,

teamid,
remarks,

mapper.update:
update mechanic
mechanicname = #{mechanicname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mechanicsex = #{mechanicsex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mechanicphone = #{mechanicphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contactphone = #{contactphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
urgentphone = #{urgentphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
groupleader = #{groupleader,jdbcType=INTEGER},
teamid = #{teamid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
starclassid = #{starclassid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where mechanicid = #{mechanicid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
